pathAssistantSteps.info:
In this phase of the deal, you will update:

  • BDM Deal Summary: Key details of the deal
  • Trip Concept & Marketing: Includes "Deal Highlights", "Itinerary Outline." In the Marketing sub-tab BDMs detail ideas for marketing for the Deal
  • Flights: PAF will edit access to Departure Cities under this sub-tab and all other users will have read-only access to see the departure cities related to this deal
  • Pricing: this includes Options, Sub-Options, Components (merchant specific products), Component Pricing and Additional Extras (Land Activities, AE/SB, AirUpgrade, Sub StopOvers
  • Logistics: Includes Transfers and specific Deal Contacts such as Emergency or Reservations
  • Stress Test: For QA by the product team, here the Deal will be compared against competitor deals to make sure our deal is better!
